 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁבַע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה‎</span><sub>394</sub> **noun masculine** and **feminine** ==seven== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>16</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שבעת‎</span> Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***sibi***</u></abbr>, ***sibittu*** ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Gr. § 65, 6</sup>; ***s*** = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>), Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סבע‎</span> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 47, 124</sup>, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"><img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Phoenician (Punic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שבע‎</span> Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שבע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שבעה‎</span>, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שבעא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שבעה‎</span>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁבַע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; on etymology compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 37 f.</sup>); — 

**masculine** (c. **noun feminine**) absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁבַע‎</span> [[Gen.41.2|Gen 41:2]] + 115 t.; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבַע‎</span> [[Gen.5.26|Gen 5:26]] + 47 t., especially [[BDB#P|P]] (15 t.) and Chronicles (20 t.), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּשֲׁבַע‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.21|1Kgs 14:21]] **feminine** (c. **noun masculine**) absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה‎</span> [[Gen.4.24|Gen 4:24]] + 100 t.; construct<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעַת‎</span> [[Gen.7.10|Gen 7:10]] + 120 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבַעְתָּם‎</span> [[2Sam.21.9|2Sam 21:9]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (so [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] and modern; see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; &gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָתַיִם‎</span>; — ***seven:*** 

**1.** without other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁבַע‎</span>, before feminine plural noun [[Gen.21.28|Gen 21:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.16.13|Judg 16:13]]; [[Isa.4.1|Isa 4:1]] + 80 t., especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.29.18|Gen 29:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) + 32 t. (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁלוֺשׁ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁבַע‎</span> [[2Sam.24.13|2Sam 24:13]]a, compare v<sup>b, c,</sup> also [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] and \|\| [[1Chr.21.12|1Chr 21:12]] so [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּעָמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.33.3|Gen 33:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.4.6|Lev 4:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) + 17 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאַמָּה רָחְבָּהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.6.6|1Kgs 6:6]] after noun [[Ezek.40.20|Ezek 40:20]]; [[Ezek.40.26|Ezek 40:26]] noun omitted [[Job.5.19|Job 5:19]]; [[Prov.6.16|Prov 6:16]], + (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּעָמִים שׁ‎</span>) [[Lev.26.18|Lev 26:18]]; [[Lev.26.21|Lev 26:21]]; [[Lev.26.24|Lev 26:24]]; [[Lev.26.28|Lev 26:28]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Ps.119.64|Ps 119:64]]; [[Prov.24.16|Prov 24:16]] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה‎</span> before masculine plural noun [[Num.23.1|Num 23:1]] (3 t. in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]) + 40 t. + [[Job.42.19|Job 42:19]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָ֫נָה‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:97c»§ 97c</sup> and most); + (distributive) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Zech.4.2|Zech 4:2]] after noun [[Gen.7.4|Gen 7:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.25.37|Exod 25:37]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) + 12 t. ([[BDB#P|P]] Chronicles Daniel Proverbs); noun omitted [[1Sam.2.5|1Sam 2:5]] + 9 t., including <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> as ordinal, see below; but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂבָכָה‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.17|1Kgs 7:17]] (twice in verse) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bur|Bur]]; also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> distributive = 7 ***each*** [[Gen.7.2|Gen 7:2]]; [[Gen.7.3|Gen 7:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); as predicate [[Gen.46.25|Gen 46:25]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעַת‎</span>, before plural noun [[Num.23.4|Num 23:4]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.8.2|Num 8:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezek.45.23|Ezek 45:23]] (twice in verse); [[Job.2.13|Job 2:13]] (twice in verse) + 97 t., incl <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.8.10|Gen 8:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), + 88 t. + [[Ezek.45.21|Ezek 45:21]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעַת‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבֻעוֺת‎</span> [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] and modern), 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** = ordinal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַת (הַ)שֶּׁבַע‎</span>[[Deut.15.2|Deut 15:2]]; [[2Kgs.12.2|2Kgs 12:2]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשִׁבְעָה לַחֹדֶשׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.30.20|Ezek 30:20]], compare [[Ezek.45.20|Ezek 45:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשִׁבְעַת הַיָּמִים‎</span> [[Gen.7.10|Gen 7:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Chr.9.25|1Chr 9:25]] 

**2.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבַע עֶשְׂרֵה שָׁנָה‎</span> 17 ***years*** [[Gen.37.2|Gen 37:2]] + 3 t. + [[1Kgs.14.21|1Kgs 14:21]], also as ordinal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשׂ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.52|1Kgs 22:52]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשׂ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת שׁ‎</span> [[2Kgs.16.1|2Kgs 16:1]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה עָשָׂר‎</span> (that is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַגּוֺרָל‎</span> ***lot***) [[1Chr.24.15|1Chr 24:15]]; [[1Chr.25.24|1Chr 25:24]] (compare also, + other number, [[1Chr.7.11|1Chr 7:11]]; [[Ezra.2.30|Ezra 2:30]]; [[Neh.7.42|Neh 7:42]]), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span> 17th day [[Gen.7.11|Gen 7:11]]; [[Gen.8.4|Gen 8:4]] unusual is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁקָלִים וַעֲשָׂרָה הַכֶּסֶף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Jer.32.9|Jer 32:9]] ***7 shekels and 10 the silver*** 

**3.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבַע מֵאוֺת‎</span> = 700 [[Judg.8.26|Judg 8:26]] + 39 t. (but [[Neh.7.68|Neh 7:68]] omitted by Masora [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] q. v.). 

**4.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה אֶלֶף‎</span> = 7000 [[1Kgs.20.30|1Kgs 20:30]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעַת אֲלָפִים‎</span> = ***id.*** [[1Kgs.20.15|1Kgs 20:15]]+ 15 t.; 57,000 is 7 + 50 x 1000 [[Num.1.31|Num 1:31]]; [[Num.2.8|Num 2:8]]; [[Num.2.31|Num 2:31]]. 

**5.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> + other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> follows 18 t.: (1) singular noun after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Judg.8.14|Judg 8:14]] also (= ordinal number) [[Ezek.29.17|Ezek 29:17]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשִׁים וָשׁ‎</span> [[2Kgs.13.10|2Kgs 13:10]], compare [[2Kgs.15.1|2Kgs 15:1]] (2) plural noun before other number [[Ezra.8.35|Ezra 8:35]]; [[Neh.7.1|Neh 7:1]]:[72]; [[Neh.7.71|Neh 7:71]] (3) singular noun construct precedes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת עֶשְׂרִים וָשׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.16.10|1Kgs 16:10]]; [[1Kgs.16.15|1Kgs 16:15]] (ordinal); (4) noun after each number [[Gen.23.1|Gen 23:1]]; [[Gen.23.25|Gen 23:25]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), etc. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> precedes 10 t. ([[BDB#P|P]] and Esther): (1) noun singular after other number [[Gen.8.14|Gen 8:14]]; [[Exod.6.16|Exod 6:16]]; [[Exod.6.20|Exod 6:20]] + 3 t. Esther; (2) noun repeated [[Gen.5.7|Gen 5:7]]; [[Gen.11.21|Gen 11:21]]; [[Gen.47.28|Gen 47:28]], compare [[Gen.5.25|Gen 5:25]]; [[Gen.5.31|Gen 5:31]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** 1000 + 17 [[Ezra.2.39|Ezra 2:39]] = [[Neh.7.42|Neh 7:42]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> often with sacred significance: [[Gen.21.28|Gen 21:28]]ff. ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.37.23|Exod 37:23]]; [[Lev.4.6|Lev 4:6]]; [[Lev.4.17|Lev 4:17]]; [[Lev.8.11|Lev 8:11]]; [[Lev.14.27|Lev 14:27]] + ([[BDB#P|P]]); as round number [[Gen.4.24|Gen 4:24]] (song in [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.29.18|Gen 29:18]]ff; [[Gen.31.23|Gen 31:23]]; [[Gen.41.2|Gen 41:2]]ff (all [[BDB#E|E]]), etc.; on bowing 7 t. [[Gen.33.3|Gen 33:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; in great humility), compare [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>TelAm. nos. 143, 230, 246</sup> [[BDB#Nes|Ne]]<sup>Mar,11 f.</sup>; all these probably originating with week of seven days; compare especially [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Hast. DB NUMBER, 562 f.</sup>, 565. 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָ֫נָה‎</span> [[Job.42.13|Job 42:13]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁבְעָה‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:97c»§ 97c</sup> and most.
